description: This file contains unit tests for the OptionalType template class from the WPEFramework project's Core module, using the Google Test framework. The tests cover basic functionalities such as construction, assignment, comparison, and value access.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: A template class for optional values that may or may not be set, supporting operations like assignment, comparison, and value retrieval.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Resets the OptionalType instance to an unset state.

methods.name: IsSet
methods.description: Checks whether the OptionalType instance currently holds a value.

methods.name: Value
methods.description: Retrieves the value held by the OptionalType instance.
